snippet: Los Angeles Lakers trainer GARY VITTI's failure to wear gloves as a precaution against AIDS transmission while treating a cut on MAGIC JOHNSON's forearm will be investigated by California's workplace-safety agency. A Rhode Island doctor's complain...
lead_paragraph: Los Angeles Lakers trainer GARY VITTI's failure to wear gloves as a precaution against AIDS transmission while treating a cut on MAGIC JOHNSON's forearm will be investigated by California's workplace-safety agency. A Rhode Island doctor's complaint concerning Vitti's actions has been turned over to the state Occupational Safety and Health Administration by Federal O.S.H.A. officials, The Daily News of Los Angeles reported yesterday.
